name: Star Commando
overview: YOUR MISSION: The Galaxy is under attack by Cosmic invaders. Galactic Pirates and Sausonic Raiders have all but brought trade to a standstill. And who put the mines in the Space Lanes? Anyhow, somebody's got to sort it out. There's a new rookie starting - what's his name....? Don't expect he'll last long. Don't expect he'll get his Star Commando's wings - if he does he'll have earned them! - Delightful 3D perspective - 16 sector galaxies - 100% machine code FAST action - Hi-res; flicker-free; SPRITE graphics - Full colour - Great sound effects - Hall of Fame feature - Play with JOYSTICK or KEYBOARD A FAST-ACTION ARCADE-STYLE 3D GAME SPECIALLY WRITTEN FOR THE COMMODORE 64 BY REG STEVENS - AUTHOR OF SUPER SKRAMBLE!
